name: the bottom line
description: Neighborhood coffeehouse with open-mike nights serving espresso drinks, tea & pastries in cozy digs.

name: the red hook
description: Hot java drinks & desserts in airy, bright surrounds featuring wooden banquettes & white walls.

name: cafe 1923
description: Hip, bustling spot for coffee, desserts & sandwiches featuring bookcases & vintage oak shelving.

name: astro coffee
description: Small, cozy cafe serving a variety of coffee & tea plus locally sourced baked goods & sandwiches.

name: great lakes coffee roasting company
description: Cafe furnished with reclaimed wood & exposed ducts serving micro-roasted coffees, beer & snacks.

name: socra tea
description: Trendy & cozy hidden in the back walking area off the busy streets. Specialty teas & deserts, including gluten free!

name: dessert oasis coffee roasters
description: Comfortable coffee shop downtown with a small selection of food.

name: avalon cafe and bakery downtown
description: Casual counter serve for salads, sandwiches & organic, housemade pastries & fresh breads.

name: DIA kresge court
description: Atrium cafe at the Detroit Institute of Arts offering sandwiches, salads, pastries & coffee.

name: bikes and coffee
description: Small neighborhood coffee shop also offering bike repair services.
